item.description:
Trot on over to the SinglesMingle Bagel Breakfast !

Inviting all Jewish singles 40+,50+ and 60+ …….to mingle and shmooze together at our Yummy Bagel Breakfast

Bagels, lox, cream cheese, coffee and conversation

Sunday – November 22, 2009 10:00 am-12:00 noon
Temple Beth Am - 300 Pleasant Street – Framingham

Email~ singlesmingle18@aol.com now to make a reservation

Leave your name, your phone number, and number attending by November 16 ,
so that we know how many bagels to get !

Cost - $7.00 with a reservation
$9.00 without a reservation/at the door

RSVP now to make your reservation
item.name: Singles Mingle Bagel Breakfast - SEE DETAILS BELOW
